content:
Imagine you are a robot browsing the web, just like humans. Now you need to complete a task. In each iteration, you will receive an Observation that includes a screenshot of a webpage and some texts. This screenshot will feature Numerical Labels placed in the TOP LEFT corner of each Web Element.
Carefully analyze the visual information to identify the Numerical Label corresponding to the Web Element that requires interaction, then follow the guidelines and choose one of the following actions:
1. Click a Web Element.
2. Delete existing content in a textbox and then type content. 
3. Scroll up or down. Multiple scrolls are allowed to browse the webpage. Pay attention!! The default scroll is the whole window. If the scroll widget is located in a certain area of the webpage, then you have to specify a Web Element in that area. I would hover the mouse there and then scroll.
4. Wait. Typically used to wait for unfinished webpage processes, with a duration of 5 seconds.
5. Go back, returning to the previous webpage.
6. Google, directly jump to the Google search page. When you can't find information in some websites, try starting over with Google.
7. Answer. This action should only be chosen when all questions in the task have been solved.

Correspondingly, Action should STRICTLY follow the format:
- Click [Numerical_Label]
- Type [Numerical_Label]; [Content]
- Scroll [Numerical_Label or WINDOW]; [up or down]
- Wait
- GoBack
- Google
- ANSWER; [content]

Key Guidelines You MUST follow:
* Action guidelines *
1) To input text, NO need to click textbox first, directly type content. After typing, the system automatically hits `ENTER` key. Sometimes you should click the search button to apply search filters. Try to use simple language when searching.  
2) You must Distinguish between textbox and search button, don't type content into the button! If no textbox is found, you may need to click the search button first before the textbox is displayed. 
3) Execute only one action per iteration. 
4) STRICTLY Avoid repeating the same action if the webpage remains unchanged. You may have selected the wrong web element or numerical label. Continuous use of the Wait is also NOT allowed.
5) When a complex Task involves multiple questions or steps, select "ANSWER" only at the very end, after addressing all of these questions (steps). Flexibly combine your own abilities with the information in the web page. Double check the formatting requirements in the task when ANSWER. 
* Web Browsing Guidelines *
1) Don't interact with useless web elements like Login, Sign-in, donation that appear in Webpages. Pay attention to Key Web Elements like search textbox and menu.
2) Vsit video websites like YouTube is allowed BUT you can't play videos. Clicking to download PDF is allowed and will be analyzed by the Assistant API.
3) Focus on the numerical labels in the TOP LEFT corner of each rectangle (element). Ensure you don't mix them up with other numbers (e.g. Calendar) on the page.
4) Focus on the date in task, you must look for results that match the date. It may be necessary to find the correct year, month and day at calendar.
5) Pay attention to the filter and sort functions on the page, which, combined with scroll, can help you solve conditions like 'highest', 'cheapest', 'lowest', 'earliest', etc. Try your best to find the answer that best fits the task.

Your reply should strictly follow the format:
Thought: {Your brief thoughts (briefly summarize the info that will help ANSWER)}
Action: {One Action format you choose}
Confidence: {A float between 0 and 1 indicating your confidence level in the action. A higher value means greater confidence.}
Completion: {A float between 0 and 1 indicating how much of the task has been completed until now. Zero means no progress has been made and one means full completion.}

Then the User will provide:
Observation: {A labeled screenshot Given by User}

Now given a task: Find the Return Policy for Mens Rhinestone Skull Graphic Shirt on Amazon. Color: Black, Size: XX-Large. If Free return is avaliable, tell me how to return this item.  Please interact with https://www.amazon.com/ and get the answer.Observation: A screenshot and some texts. (Omitted in context.)

Thought: To continue searching on Amazon.com for the "Mens Rhinestone Skull Graphic Shirt," I need to select the option to stay on the Amazon.com site.
Action: Click [1]
Confidence: 1.0
Completion: 0.05
Observation: A screenshot and some texts. (Omitted in context.)

Thought: To search for the "Mens Rhinestone Skull Graphic Shirt," I should use the search bar at the top of the page. The textbox for search is labeled [2].
Action: Type [2]; Mens Rhinestone Skull Graphic Shirt Black XX-Large
Confidence: 1.0
Completion: 0.1
token: : Type [2]; Mens Rhinestone Skull Graphic Shirt Black XX-Large

content: Observation: A screenshot and some texts. (Omitted in context.)

Thought: The search results show the "HZCX FASHION Mens Rhinestone Skull Graphic Shirt" as the first product. I need to click on this product to check its return policy, color, and size options.
Action: Click [17]
Confidence: 1.0
Completion: 0.2
Observation: A screenshot and some texts. (Omitted in context.)

Thought: I need to select the correct color ("942 Black") and then choose the size ("XX-Large") to see the return policy and if free return is available. The color "942 Black" option is visible, and size selection drop-down is labeled [54].
Action: Click [54]
Confidence: 1.0
Completion: 0.3
Observation: A screenshot and some texts. (Omitted in context.)

Thought: The size selection dropdown ([54]) is open. I need to find and select the "XX-Large" option for this shirt to proceed to check return policy details relevant for the selected color and size.
Action: Scroll [54]; down
Confidence: 0.95
Completion: 0.35
Observation: A screenshot and some texts. (Omitted in context.)

Thought: The size options are visible at the top, and "XX-Large" (tag [13]) is present. I need to select "XX-Large" to see item-specific details, including return policy information.
Action: Click [13]
Confidence: 1.0
Completion: 0.45
Observation: A screenshot and some texts. (Omitted in context.)

Thought: The size "XX-Large" is now selected. To check if free return is available and to view the return policy, I need to look at the purchase/availability box typically on the right side of the product page, which may be located further up the page.
Action: Scroll [WINDOW]; up
Confidence: 0.95
Completion: 0.5

Thought: The buy box area on the right shows the return policy: "30-day refund / replacement". There is no mention of "Free returns", which is usually explicitly stated if available. Next, I should verify if "Free returns" is mentioned when clicking the "30-day refund / replacement" link (tag [41]) to confirm return details and instructions.
Action: Click [41]
Confidence: 0.98
Completion: 0.7

Thought: The popup confirms the return policy: "This item can be returned in its original condition for a full refund or replacement within 30 days of receipt." There is no mention of "Free returns," indicating the buyer may have to pay for the return shipping. For complete details and steps, I should check the "Read full return policy" link ([43]) for exact instructions.
Action: Click [43]
Confidence: 0.98
Completion: 0.8

Thought: The Amazon Return Policy page explains that returns are available within 30 days in original condition. It mentions that "for eligible items, you can enjoy free returns," but this depends on eligibility as stated on the product detail page. For this shirt, the earlier detail page did NOT state "Free Returns," suggesting return shipping may not be covered by Amazon. The process to return is through your order history after the purchase.
Action: ANSWER; 
The Mens Rhinestone Skull Graphic Shirt, Black, Size XX-Large, is eligible for return within 30 days of receipt in its original condition for a full refund or replacement. There is no indication that "Free Returns" are available for this item, which means you may need to cover return shipping. 

To return this item: 
1. Go to "Your Orders" in your Amazon account.
2. Find the order with this shirt.
3. Select "Return or Replace Items" and follow the instructions to get a return label.
4. Prepare and ship the item back using the provided instructions.

Free returns are NOT specifically offered for this item.
Confidence: 1.0
Completion: 1.0

To return this item:

2. Find the order with this shirt.
3. Select "Return or Replace Items" and follow the instructions to get a return label.
4. Prepare and ship the item back using the provided instructions.
